course_name: Professional Practice in Nutrition and Dietetics 5
description: This course allows students to complete 20 days of placement in an area of practice that they wish to study in more depth, and extends the student beyond what is normally considered entry level. Topics that can be selected are those emerging as new areas of practice or are of increasing significance and include: dietetic practice and mental health, private practice, rural health and paediatric dietetics.
prerequisites: DIET 7101, DIET7102, DIET7103, DIET7104, DIET7201, DIET7202, DIET7203 and DIET7204
